## üéØ How It Works (TL;DR)

1. **You write docs** in the codebase (markdown files)
2. **GitHub Actions** automatically syncs them to the wiki
3. **Wiki is protected** so only workflows can update it
4. **Result**: Wiki stays in sync, all changes go through code review!
